Glycerol

Basic Information

PubChem CID:753
Formula:C3H8O3
Molecular Weight:92.09 g/mol
Cryoprotectant:Yes
SMILES:C(C(CO)O)O

Description

A common cryoprotectant used in various applications.

Properties
